entry.title: dotnet/sdk - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-09-16
entry.content:
Issues

Closed

  • [API Compat] add rule to make sure that a member is not made more visible #23904
    Backlog
  • net6.0-macos publishes a .pkg file #27841

Updated

  • [Megathread] Engineering Status of RID Improvements and Publish UX Changes #26503
  • Turn PackageValidation on by default #23910
  • SDK searches for Microsoft.NETCore.App.Ref version 6.0.10 and cannot find it #27888
  • .NET Core 6 Found multiple publish output files with the same relative path #22716

PullRequests

Created

  • Add Description to Workload --info #27973
    Area-CLI
  • Add --ucr shorthand for --use-current-runtime #27971
    Area-CLI
  • Trusted roots: August 2022 CTL #27970
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Implement publish-self-contained #27969
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Avoid extra copies of dotnet-watch build outputs in the SDK directory #27964
    Area-Infrastructure, Area-Watch
  • Make mapping infrastructure unit testable, Ignore effectively sealed members and types and add tests #27962
    Area-ApiCompat
  • Handle test parser forwarded args #27961
    Servicing-consider, Area-DotNet Test, Area-CLI, cli-ux, 7.0.1xx
  • Update ubuntu version in template-engine.yml #27951
    Area-Infrastructure

Merged

  • Make F5 of dotnet-watch project from VS work #27947
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Trusted roots: August 2022 CTL #27824
    Area-Infrastructure
  • apicompat: add rule to check change in visibility #27929
    Area-Infrastructure
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/6.0.4xx' => 'release/7.0.1xx' #27919
    Area-Infrastructure

Updated

  • Target net7.0 in additional projects #27012
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 140: Build ID 1996225 #27667
  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 140: Build ID 1996151 #27904
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Improve build stability by ensuring we aren't double publishing everywhere #27899
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Expand existing warning to target 5.0 #27942
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/7.0.1xx' => 'main' #27916
    Area-Infrastructure
